title: Alesha Dixon steals the show at Simon Cowell's birthday bash weeks after secretly giving birth
text:

Alesha Dixon has just given birth to her baby daughter.

But the Britain's Got Talent judge wasted no time returning to her glamorous showbiz lifestyle as she attended Simon Cowell's 60th birthday bash on Monday night.

The singer was positively glowing as she headed to celebrity hotspot Nobu in Malibu with her husband Azuka Ononye and her daughter Azura Sienna, six.

Alesha looked thrilled to be a part of the music mogul's milestone celebrations which was actually the same day as her 41st birthday.

The former Mis-Teeq bandmate looked amazing in a black maxi dress with sheer panel detailing and she tied her hair back in a sleek bun.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Her dapper husband didn't let her down on the style stakes as he looked charming in a statement grey-and-white shirt and a tailored suit jacket.

Snaps from later in the evening showed businessman Simon looking red-faced as he finished his birthday celebrations with a bottle of wine and a few packs of cigarettes.

Alesha joined a star-studded crowd including Howie Mandel and Kelly Osbourne at Simon's birthday event.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: SplashNews.com)

The beauty's appearance at Simon's Malibu birthday comes as she confirmed that she and Azuka had welcomed their second child with a post on Instagram on Monday.

The pop icon introduced the tiny tot to the world with an adorable snap .

She wrote: "Anaya Safiya. Born 20.08.19. 7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet."

(Image: SplashNews.com)

The mother-of-two was soon inundated with well wishes from her 883K followers.

Alesha managed to keep the news of Anaya’s arrival under wraps for nearly two months and saved her birth announcement for her 41st birthday yesterday.

The singer also chose her birthday to announce the birth of her first child, Azura Sienna, back in 2013.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

The TV judge sparked rumours she'd secretly given birth after being spotted on the set of America's Got Talent: The Champions on Friday wearing a crop top.

Back in May, Alesha confirmed news of her pregnancy during a live episode of Britain's Got Talent.

Alesha stood up to reveal her blossoming bump for the first time midway through a song and dance routine performed by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly.

(Image: Instagram)

Once the secret was out, Alesha rocked incredible maternity wear throughout the rest of the series and for the final of Britain's Got Talent: The Champions stepped out in a stunning see-through dress.

The show saw dance act Twist and Pulse crowned overall winners .

The former Mis-Teeq singer will have her hands full as she juggles being a mum of two with her new day job on America's Got Talent : The Champions.
description: Alesha Dixon glowed as she stepped out for the first time since confirming the birth of her second child for Simon Cowell's 60th party
